--- alter_change_stream_set_for_all.sql
ALTER CHANGE STREAM change_stream_name SET FOR ALL

--- AST
&ast.AlterChangeStream{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 20,
    NameEnd: 38,
    Name:    "change_stream_name",
  },
  Watch: &ast.ChangeStreamWatch{
    WatchTables:  []*ast.ChangeStreamWatchTable(nil),
    SetForAllPos: 51,
  },
  DropAll:    false,
  DropAllPos: 0,
  Options:    (*ast.ChangeStreamOptions)(nil),
}

--- SQL
ALTER CHANGE STREAM change_stream_name SET FOR ALL
